𓆣 󳻊 󳻋 󳻌 󳻍 󳻎 󳻏 󳻐 󳻑 󳻒 󳻓

The sign 𓆣 has two readings according to Gardiner and the hieroglyph alphabet itself:

  1. 𓆣 Käfer 𓐍 𓊪 𓂋 𓂋 𓆣 #k-ph-r-r Körper Kraft craft
  2. 𓆣 Beetle 𓆣 𓃀 𓏏 𓏥 #bdt body <> 𓆓 𓂧 𓃀 bite @ 𓆤 pyutk- 𓊪 𓏏 𓎛 "create"

𒆠 ⋍ 𓐍 𒄿 ⋍ 𓊪 𒊑 ⋍ 𓂋 in
𒆠 𒄿 𒊭 𒊑 ki-ƒi-šaʳ-re 𓐍 𓊪 𓂋 𓂋 𓆣 happen

𓆣 ≈ 𒌤 ≈ 𒆜𒌣 KA…𒌓BIR₂ "create" ≈ great(utu)

𒌤 #šapāku shape 𓆣

Large family of words for shrimps, crayfish, scorpions and crabs beginning with /kaɾ/ mentioned at Persian
خرچنگ xarčang, “crab” 𓐍 𓊪 𓂋 𓂋 𓆣
カニ kani 蟹 かに kani cancer < granchio < *kankros *karkros circle ⇔ таңқышаян (tañqışayan)

scrape ⇔ 𓆣 scarab shape create 𓈎 𓇋 𓀾 𓏜 corpus 𓈎 𓋴 𓌟

𓆣 Käfer 𓐍𓊪𓂋𓂋𓆣 #k-ph-r-r > κάραβος kárabos “beetle”
𓆣 Käfer 𒄷𒌨𒊑 Huvor (Akkadian orthograpyh) (in 𓇳𓆣𓎟𓏤𓏤𓏤 )
𓆣 capāre > chever “happen“
𓆣 ki-ƒi-ša-re 𒆠𒄿𒊭𒊑 𓐍 𓊪 𓂋 𓆣 happen 𒆠 𒄿 𒊭 𒊑
𓆣 cƒri ≈ 𒍜 #siri carrion 𓆣 Körper 𓐍𓊪𓂋𓅱𓏛𓏥 corpus 𓄡𓏏𓏤 "body"
𓆣 Kiphrim 𓐍𓊪𓂋𓂋𓆣 ⇔ 𒆨 KISIM5
𓆣 𓐍𓊪𓆣 KWN 𐩫𐩥𐩬 schaffen "take place, occur" 𓆣𓂋𓇋𓇋𓀀 ⋍chard = children 𓄡𓏏𓏤
𓆣𓂋𓇋𓀭 Khopri Chephre (divinity) ⇔ copper 𓋹
𓆣𓂋𓏥 (q)о́бразъ óbraz shaper, form
𓆣𓂋𓏥 shaper 𓋴𓆣𓂋 scarve > carve sculpture 𓄛
𓆣𓂋𓏥 geform μορφή frame
𓆣 𓐍𓊪𓆣 c'r.p ⋍ Scarabaeus > ϣⲁⲗⲟⲩⲕⲥ
𓆣 𓐍𓊪 cc'p ⋍ Sisyphus 𓆣𓐍𓏘

𓆣 shaper ⇔ 𓐍𓊪𓂋
ص و ر (ṣ-w-r) of صُورَة (ṣūra, “form, image” ⇔ तसवीर tasvir 𓏏𓇋𓂇 spore?
𓆣 shapen schaffen happen 𓁹 make happen
𓆣 ϣⲁⲗⲟⲩⲕⲥ < scarabaeus < 𓐍𓂋𓊪𓆣

𓆣 ج ر ب ʒ-r-b:jarab:scarab:scratch

𓆣 k-p-r vs 𓆓 cobra 𓆔𓆕𓆗𓇴𓇳

Sanskrit शरीर (śarīra, “body„)
True orthographic transcription: शरीर = Çorfr

vs 𓆓 𓏏 𓏤 body, image … ⋍= 𓄡𓏏𓏤 身体 shēntǐ 生 shēng ⇔ status:

𓇇𓆤 HorNeith Bit (horned beetles)

Schäfer甲虫

scar 𓋴𓂓𓄿𓍁𓂝 plow
cut 𓐍𓏏𓂷𓂡 carve, engrave
a'cut 𓆱𓐍𓏏𓌫𓂡 carve, engrave
aqhar*t 𓂝𓈎𓄿𓂭𓂭𓏜 1. akkurat 2. ἀγαθ:good 3. a'carpe diem
act 𓂝𓈎𓄿 aqhar ⇔ make 𓁹
𓋴𓆣𓂋 char Scharte scharren scharf hharf:sharp++ ⇨ Scheren
𓈎𓂋𓋴𓌟𓀜 «qurse» = burial ⇔ 𓊖 kurgan 𓊼𓊻
𓈎𓅱𓂋𓏤 quarry gold miner ⇔ χρυσοῦς chrysous = gold ⇔ crystal Christ 'shining'
𓇋𓂋𓏏𓀺𓏛 use, purpose
